aka: 詹姆仕布朗特:上尉诗人的乐坛传奇(台)
trans_title: 詹姆仕布朗特:上尉诗人的乐坛传奇(台)
introduction: Till You're Told To Stop is a unique independent film that follows the career of British singer songwriter James Blunt.Till You're Told To Stop是一部独家完整记录英国歌手JAMES BLUNT事业历程的影片We witness the steps the singer took to start in the music industry in 2004 after resigning from his post in the army, through to his enormous worldwide success with his debut album Back To Bedlam.我们见证了从他退伍后于2004年开始涉足音乐领域,直至首张专辑BACK TO BEDLAM在全球的巨大的成功。What happens between the summer of 2004 and the summer of 2007 (the early gigs, release, promotion, tour and success in the UK and the US of the album Back to Bedlam) constitutes one of the most amazing musical journeys in decades.在2004到2007年间发生的事件(早期的演唱会,发行曲目,推广,巡演和专辑BACK TO BEDLAM在英国和美国的成功)抒写了最美好的音乐篇章之一。
